entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH IN EFFECT, Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers with thunderstorms beginning early this evening. Risk of severe thunderstorms this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
